info.title: Resource Metadata Management API
info.description: These are set of APIs which return the NIST public data repository related information. First one is the Search and discover API to get the dataset results for given criteria or dataset identifier. Second is to get different versions of the records or metadata for given dataset. Third one is to get the usage metrics for different datasets. For any inquiries, please contact the support team at datasupport@nist.gov.

tags.name: Discovery/Search API
tags.description: These endpoints provide search functionality for public data repository metadata.

tags.name: Usage Metrics API
tags.description: This set of endpoints  serve the usage metrics for data distribution by public data repository.

tags.name: Versions and Releases API
tags.description: These endpoints provide search functionality for public data repository metadata.

get.description:
Return all the versions available based on query criteria.
 following are some search query examples
 1. /versions?searchphrase=<phrase or words>
 2. /versions?key1=value1&logicalOp=AND&key2=value2...
 3. /versions?searchphrase=<phrase or words>&key=value...
 4. /records?page=1&size=2
 5. /versions?sort.desc=<field or comma seperated list of fields>

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of records per page.

parameters.name: sort.desc
parameters.description: sort on the fields seperated by comma (one or more).

parameters.name: sort.asc
parameters.description: Sort in ascending order seperated by comma (one or more).

get.summary: Get NERDm record of given id.
get.description: Resource returns a NERDm Record by given ediid.

get.summary: Get NERDm record of given id.
get.description: Resource returns a NERDm Record by given ark identifier.
Returns all the metrics information related to datasets.
Returns all the metrics information related to complete repository.

Get the metrics for given dataset or list of datasets.
 following are some search query examples
 1. /records
 /records?page=1&size=2
 /recorsd?sort.desc=<field or comma seperated list of fields>

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of records per page.

parameters.name: sort.desc
parameters.description: sort on the fields seperated by comma (one or more).

parameters.name: sort.asc
parameters.description: Sort in ascending order seperated by comma (one or more).

get.description: Returns all the metrics information related to given datasets.
Returns all the metrics information related to files.
Returns all the metrics information related to requested file or list of files from given dataset.
This resource returns all the taxonomy used in RMM service.
This will return other Resource apis available at NIST.

Returns all the documents in Releaseset collection based on input criteria.
 following are some search query examples
 1. /releaseSets?searchphrase=<phrase or words>
 2. /releaseSets?key1=value1&logicalOp=AND&key2=value2...
 3. /releaseSets?searchphrase=<phrase or words>&key=value...
 4. /records?page=1&size=2
 5. /releaseSets?sort.desc=<field or comma seperated list of fields>

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of records per page.

parameters.name: sort.desc
parameters.description: sort on the fields seperated by comma (one or more).

parameters.name: sort.asc
parameters.description: Sort in ascending order seperated by comma (one or more).

 following are some search query examples
